translations: n.生态旅游，生态旅行（前往生态资源未被破坏的地方旅行）（ecotourism 的变形）

sentences.sentence: Ecotourist development is the travel form of a kind of burgeoning higher level.
sentences.translation: 生态旅游是一种新兴的较高层次的旅游形式。

sentences.sentence: If you answered yes to more than one of these questions, you just might be an ecotourist.
sentences.translation: 如果你对这些问题的答案有一个以上是“对”，你就可能是生态旅游家。
